app_descript:
App Name: Social Messenger

Brief: Social Messenger is a powerful communication hub that unifies your messaging, calling, and chatting experience. It bridges the gap between various messenger services like Facebook Messenger, Viber, WhatsApp, Hangouts, Skype, and more, facilitating an all-in-one platform for seamless connectivity. Moreover, it's packed with features like stickers and an AppLocker to keep your conversations both fun and private.
